column4: hello, I am trying to compile assimp project but I get this undefined reference to `gluPerspective' , I have glut mesa installed so I dont know why I get this error
do you have the needed -dev packages installed?
I think I do, it just says glut ...
if the package is called "glut" then you need to install another package called "glut-dev" to go along with it for compiling.  Beyond this tip there is not much help I can offer.
